page.title: 09THE MARKET PLACE
page.content: Bishop Auckland has seen many new developments recently. The main new development in the town centre is the {Fine Fare Superstore}complex which was opened in 1984 near to the ancient market place with its C18-French style town hall and the adjoining{St.Anne's {Church and Visitors' Centre. The{market place}has been{redeveloped this year and some children from {St.Anne's C.E.Primary School}were at the official opening. My name is Victoria Clark and I was at the market place when it was opened. There were brightly coloured stalls with canvas tops. Also,there was a busker playing his guitar. The {Town Crier}from Alnwick opened the market, ringing his bell. He was dressed in a bright red coat and a black hat. The Chairman of{Durham {County Council}came to talk to us.
